name: Posterini
overview:
Posterini promotes your business, services, news or yourself with professional digital posters that you make with the tool, fast and easy.

It brings together 100% customized interactive design with templates, effects and real time montage together with a pinterest-like wall platform to market and advertise you and your services.

Posterini brings together in one place services that often are found on separate websites and tools.

Design digital marketing posters online by combining templates, filter effects, real time montage capabilities, 100% customizing controls and then bring the results into a pinterest-like wall platform that promotes and exhibits your business, service, news or yourself around the world.

Check it out on http://www.posterini.com/ and http://www.posterini.com/wall
